com.brightcove.plugin.onceux

Class OnceUxPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.OnceUxPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    @Emits(events={"error","hideSeekControls","pause","play","registerPlugin","seekTo","showSeekControls","noAdDataUrl","adDataReady","clickThroughLinear","endAdBreak","endDynamicVideo","sendImpression","sendTrackingBeacon","startAdBreak"})
@ListensFor(events={"completed","pause","play","stop","progress","adDataReady","endAdBreak","endDynamicVideo","clickThroughLinear","sendImpression","sendTrackingBeacon","startAdBreak"})
public class OnceUxPlugin
extends AbstractComponent
    Provide a class to support the Unicorn OnceUX funtionality, i.e. given a URL to a VMAP server, ensure that the player hides player controls, provides tracking beacons, allows clickthrough and clickthrough tracking during ad playback. NOTE/TODO: The following tasks remain to be completed: - add support for companion ads - handle errors per the VMAP spec
